vint-anys.metaDescription: 20 years is nothing - Clown and circus show for all ages by the Filigranes Company. Two inseparable companions remember and stage their 20 years of career on stage. An emotional show that combines humor, juggling and live music.

abstract.paragraph: Two inseparable companions remember and stage their 20 years of career on stage. Illusion, fraternity and the passage of time acquire a special strength, as do human relationships, skills and complicity.

list.title: 20 years is nothing
list.description: Clown show for all audiences, with constant tricks and mischief.

list.title: Show duration
list.description: 50 minutes

synopsis.paragraph: Makutu and Trinxeta combine different circus disciplines with clowning, using elements from everyday life that come to life in a very peculiar way: taking us from the past to the present and the future.

In a gesture of irony and at the same time affection towards the passage of time, the Filigranes Company makes a living, incisive and sincere self-portrait of two clowns who have grown up and made each other.

techCard.title: Duration
techCard.description: 50 minutes.

techCard.title: Setup and breakdown
techCard.description: Setup: 2h. Breakdown: 1h.

techCard.title: Dimensions
techCard.description: Outdoor minimum: 9.5m x 6m. Theatre minimum: 8m x 6m. Outdoor or theatre ideal: 11m x 8m.

techCard.title: Scenography
techCard.description: Backdrop and circular stage. Tent behind stage for outdoor.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: 250v power outlet at stage level for 1000 watt sound equipment and 2 wireless microphones.

plis-plas.metaDescription: Plis Plas - Clown and circus show for all ages by the Filigranes Company. With a chair, a funnel or a bucket, Makutu and Trinxeta will make us enjoy a constant tug-of-war, combining classic gags with juggling and live music.

abstract.paragraph: The key to this work is a constant game of tug-of-war, which gives rise to a relationship impregnated with fantasy, similar to the real world in which children live, at the same time endearing and conflicting. Between the Clown (Makutu) and the August (Toti) there is a relationship where rivalry and complicity are carefully balanced.

list.title: Plis Plas
list.description: Clown show designed for a family audience, participatory, with constant tricks and mischief.

list.title: Show duration
list.description: 50 minutes

synopsis.paragraph: Plis Plas is a show where Toti and Makutu do not stop making the "knuckle": they are angry by hook or by crook, but friendship always ends up prevailing.
With a chair, a funnel or a bucket will make us, with its personal touch, classic gags combined with juggling and live music.

techCard.title: Duration
techCard.description: 50 minutes.

techCard.title: Setup and breakdown
techCard.description: Setup: 1h 30min. Breakdown: 45min.

techCard.title: Dimensions
techCard.description: Minimum space: 6m (width) x 8m (depth). Flat surface.

techCard.title: Scenography
techCard.description: Round backdrop and semicircular stage, outdoor or indoor.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: 250v power outlet at stage level for 1000 watt sound equipment and 2 wireless microphones.

circ-filixic.metaDescription: Circ Filixic - Clown and circus show for all ages by the Filigranes Company. Makutu and Trinxeta will make us enjoy one of the smallest circuses in the world. A story full of surprises, clown work, where different disciplines from the circus world are fused.

abstract.paragraph: These two experienced clowns will surprise us with a show with various numbers recovered from the historic Filigranes Circus. The Spinning Monocycle; the Ale-hop Hula-hop; or the fantastic jugglers The Tal Kual Brothers, with their internationally recognized number with the name Xiguagua: with club passing and a spectacular finale on balance balls!

list.title: Circ Filixic
list.description: Filigranes Company, 2017

list.title: Show duration
list.description: 60 minutes

synopsis.paragraph: Welcome everyone !!!! Come on into The Filixic Circus: one of the smallest circuses in the world! Mr.Makutu, head of the historic "Filigranes Circus" goes to the track with another clown: the great Trinxeta!!
A story full of surprises, work of clowns, where different disciplines of the circus world are merged.

techCard.title: Duration
techCard.description: 60 minutes.

techCard.title: Setup and breakdown
techCard.description: Setup: 1h 30min. Breakdown: 45min.

techCard.title: Dimensions
techCard.description: Minimum space: 6m (width) x 8m (depth).

techCard.title: Scenography
techCard.description: Backdrop and semicircular stage.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: 250v power outlet at stage level for 1000 watt sound equipment and 2 wireless microphones.

circ-makutu.metaDescription: Circ Makutu - Clown and circus show for all ages by the Filigranes Company. Makutu will make us vibrate with a bunch of artists that we will have to discover together!

abstract.paragraph: In this story, Makutu takes us into the world of circus and with the participation of the attending audience, we will be able to see different circus disciplines up close, with humor as the main protagonist. Here's a dog, here's a cat, and this tale is over.

list.title: Makutu's Little Circus
list.description: Filigranes Company, 2019

list.title: Show duration
list.description: 50 minutes

synopsis.paragraph: In an small village, between mountains, came an incredible circus, with their carriages, their caravans and...
...an amount of artists that we will have to discover together!

techCard.title: Duration
techCard.description: 50 minutes.

techCard.title: Setup and breakdown
techCard.description: Setup: 1h 30min. Breakdown: 1h.

techCard.title: Dimensions

techCard.title: Scenography
techCard.description: Backdrop and semicircular stage.

techCard.title: Light and sound

circ-trinxeta.metaDescription: Circ Trinxeta - Clown and circus show for all ages by the Filigranes Company. Trinxeta will make us fly with a galactic journey through different planets full of surprises.

abstract.paragraph: Trinxeta invites us to take a journey through our entire galaxy and discover new worlds. Little by little we will discover the secrets of each planet, all while playing with different circus techniques, until we return to earth.

list.title: Trinxat doesn't Tremble
list.description: Filigranes Company, 2019

list.title: Show duration
list.description: 50 minutes

synopsis.paragraph: Trinxeta loves to travel and discover new worlds, he also likes the night sky and observing the stars. He is already determined, he wants to make a galactic flight through the different planets.
Do you dare to take a trip full of surprises? Well here we go!

techCard.title: Duration
techCard.description: 50 minutes.

techCard.title: Setup and breakdown

techCard.title: Scenography

techCard.title: Light and sound

freak-frac.metaDescription: Germans Freak Frac Parade - Itinerant clown and circus show for all ages by the Filigranes Company. The Freak Frac Brothers will make us enjoy a good time with surprises, stilt walkers, juggling and live music.

abstract.paragraph: Itinerant show with live musicians (saxophone and/or percussion) and our incredible stilt walkers. They will captivate us with their rhythms in constant movement! Different stops with juggling routines, like clubs and diabolos, rope jumping... always accompanied by music. Ideal for enlivening fairs, markets, parades... where interaction with the audience is paramount.

list.title: Germans Freak Frac Parade
list.description: Filigranes Company and Tub d'Assaig 7'70 Circus Association, 2013.

list.title: Show duration
list.description: Minimum duration of 60 minutes

synopsis.paragraph: Attention!!! Here they are! I feel the rhythm of the music that makes me move...
Oh!! They're so tall! You can see them coming from far away! Look how the musicians follow the Directore! From the instruments, well cleaned, the notes flow through streets and squares...

techCard.title: Duration
techCard.description: Minimum duration of 60 minutes.

techCard.title: Preparation time
techCard.description: 1h 30min.

techCard.title: Space
techCard.description: Itinerant street show, adaptable to indoor.
Possibility of varying the duration of the parade, depending on the space and the number of exits.

circ.metaDescription: Circus Workshop - Workshop for all ages by the Filigranes Company. With this workshop you will be able to learn first-hand about the various techniques and disciplines of the circus world.

abstract.paragraph: Learning various circus disciplines helps develop psychomotor skills, coordination and dis-coordination, and mental agility. Following the guidelines set by the workshop leaders, participants will be able to experiment and choose the technique that motivates them most.

list.title: * The number of workshop leaders may vary depending on the volume of participants.

synopsis.paragraph: Our passion for circus moves us to open its doors wide! We want to share this passion with you and make it possible for you to approach it in a didactic and fun way.
With this workshop you will be able to learn first-hand about the various techniques and disciplines of the circus world.

techCard.title: Space
techCard.description: Workshop recommended for a large outdoor space, with firm and flat ground. If held indoors, a minimum height of 3 meters is required.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: A power point is needed for the sound equipment.

techCard.title: Recommendations
techCard.description: It is recommended to wear comfortable clothes, preferably tracksuit and sneakers.

artCard.title: Juggling
artCard.description: Practice with clubs, diabolo, Chinese plates, devil sticks, balls...

artCard.title: Balance
artCard.description: Balance ball, unicycle, "rollers", stilts and tightrope (funambulism)...

bombolles-sabo.metaDescription: Soap Bubbles Workshop - Workshop for all ages by the Filigranes Company. With this workshop you will be able to learn first-hand the technique of soap bubbles.

abstract.paragraph: We will learn to prepare the ideal mixture and how to use different devices to achieve incredible bubbles in constant movement! We will immerse ourselves in a world of shapes and colors that we will learn to manipulate according to our desire!

list.description: The number of workshop leaders may vary depending on the volume of participants.

techCard.title: Space
techCard.description: Seasonal workshop, it is recommended to hold it outdoors.

techCard.title: Water point
techCard.description: A water point nearby is necessary (preferably with a hose).

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: A power point is needed for the sound equipment.

techCard.title: Recommendations
techCard.description: Use comfortable clothes and footwear that can get wet.

synopsis.paragraph: How is it possible?! A soap bubble bigger than your head! Do you want to do it with your own hands?
We'll fill everything with soap bubbles of different sizes! We'll make them dance and fly! Dare to discover this so peculiar technique.

artCard.description: The workshop leaders will make demonstrations and guide us in learning the art of making bubbles using various devices in contact with water and soap.

pallassos.metaDescription: Clowns Workshop - Workshop for all ages by the Filigranes Company. We present you the red nose! With it we will enter the world of clowns, humor, innocence and generosity.

abstract.paragraph: We will learn theatrical techniques to develop body expression, spatial awareness and individual and group communication. And we will put into practice techniques that will help us increase self-esteem and lose shyness and fear of expressing ourselves in public.

list.description: The number of workshop leaders may vary depending on the volume of participants.

synopsis.paragraph: We present you the red nose! With it we will enter the world of clowns, humor, innocence and generosity.
We will learn to look with this nose, to use the body mask and look for our character!

techCard.title: Materials
techCard.description: All materials will be provided by the Filigranes Company.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: A power point is needed for the sound equipment.

techCard.title: Recommendations
techCard.description: It is recommended to wear comfortable clothes, preferably tracksuit and sneakers.

artCard.description: Each participant will be given a red nose, which they can take home. We will have fun through games and participatory dynamics, where we will discover the clown we carry inside!

maquillatge.metaDescription: Makeup Workshop - Workshop for all ages by the Filigranes Company. With this workshop you will be able to learn first-hand the technique of makeup.

abstract.paragraph: With this workshop we will put at your disposal a whole set of fantasy makeup techniques: with brush, sponge, fingers...

list.description: The number of workshop leaders may vary depending on the volume of participants.

synopsis.paragraph: The facial art of fantasy allows us to create our own and unique character!
The skin will become our own mask and will help us to stimulate the imagination. So, when it ends... just look at the faces and get into the character!

techCard.title: Materials
techCard.description: All materials will be provided by the Filigranes Company.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: A power point is needed for the sound equipment.

techCard.title: Recommendations
techCard.description: It is recommended to wear comfortable clothes, preferably tracksuit and sneakers.

artCard.description: Each participant will be given a red nose, which they can take home. We will have fun through games and participatory dynamics, where we will discover the clown we carry inside!

enginys-aigua.metaDescription: Water Tricks Workshop - Workshop for all ages by the Filigranes Company. With this workshop we will learn to use water to create different tricks: balls, devil sticks, soap bubbles, etc.

abstract.paragraph: This refreshing workshop will give the option to spin a mill wheel, create a waterfall, play with counterweights, imagine the work required to get water from a well...

list.description: The number of workshop leaders may vary depending on the volume of participants.

synopsis.paragraph: Few things are as fun as playing with water! We will refresh and learn at the same time!
We will enjoy an itinerary with different stations, where adults and children will go through while practicing their skills in a very fun way.

techCard.title: Space
techCard.description: Seasonal workshop, it is recommended to hold it outdoors.

techCard.title: Water point
techCard.description: A water point nearby is necessary (preferably with a hose).

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: A power point is needed for the sound equipment.

techCard.title: Recommendations
techCard.description: Use comfortable clothes and footwear that can get wet.

artCard.description: Wooden structures combined with recycled elements will create awareness in adults and children about the importance of recycling and water conservation.

abstract.paragraph: These authentic chameleons of the scene perform different actions and tricks with humor always present: juggling tricks, disguises, magic, music, surprising actions, humor routines and participatory games. They will reveal their identity from the beginning or at a certain moment.

synopsis.paragraph: Cooks, bakers, waiters, firefighters, tandem gardeners, cleaning women, period circus... And also stilt walkers, unicyclists, balance ball or fire jugglers.
They both present organized activities and interact with the public, adapting the costume and characterization.

filipersones.metaDescription: We founded the Filigranes Company in 2004. We are a group linked to performing arts, mainly with the circus world and the fascinating world of clowns. Our main task is the creation and production of shows.
filipersones.claimTitle: We fill streets and theaters with humor, magic and emotion.
filipersones.claim: Get to know the Filigranes Company and let yourself be captivated by the world of clowns and circus!
filipersones.knowMore: The origins of our passion for performing arts

origins.paragraph: The Filigranes Company is made up of Jordi Torrens (Trinxeta) and Albert Pérez (Makutu) as clown actors. Since 1996 we have been performing together in different initiatives related to performing arts, mainly with the circus world and the fascinating world of clowns.

history.paragraph: In 2004 we founded the Filigranes Company. Since then, our main task has been the creation and production of shows: "Embolics a bord", "El Circ Filixic", "El Circ Filirates", "Desencaixats", "Germans Freak Frac", "Plis Plas", "El petit circ de Makutu", "Trinxat no tremola", "20 anys no són res", "Germans Filigranes"...

filiFriends.paragraph: Currently we are accompanied by Walter Velázquez (director/dramaturg) and Francesc Pascual (sound and lighting technician). We have also worked with Mago Manu (artistic director) and Carles Grau (director/dramaturg).

background.paragraph: In addition to having performed in a wide range of Festes Majors, theaters, Festivals, Galas, Circus Cabarets..., they actively participate in other initiatives: They are trainers and founding members of the Terrassa Circus Association Tub d'Assaig 7'70; and members of the Association of Circus Professionals of Catalonia and Clowns Without Borders.

makutu.metaDescription: Albert (Makutu) has performed throughout Catalonia and Spain; and also in Latin America: in Guatemala, Mexico, Nicaragua, Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay, Bolivia, Peru... Currently he is a member of the Filigranes Company (2004) and the Tub d'Assaig 7'70 Circus Association. He works as a trainer and also practices disciplines related to the circus world, such as juggling, object manipulation, balance ball or stilts.

abstract.paragraph: Currently Albert is a member of the Filigranes Company (2004) and the Tub d'Assaig 7'70 Circus Association. He works as a trainer and also practices disciplines related to the circus world, such as juggling, object manipulation, balance ball or stilts.

list.title: Albert Pérez
list.description: He has performed throughout Catalonia and Spain; and also in Latin America: in Guatemala, Mexico, Nicaragua, Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay, Bolivia, Peru...

intro.paragraph: Graduated in Social Education, Albert was born in Terrassa in 1977. He began to be interested in the circus world at 16, although from a very young age he had already stepped on some stage performing musical and theatrical performances. He attended the Terrassa Music Conservatory until he was 14, where he learned solfeggio and guitar.

background.paragraph: Later he combined his training with participation in various companies. He took numerous clown courses: at the "El Timbal" acting school (with Merche Ochoa), at the "Rogelio Rivel Circus School" (with Joan Armengol); and others with Manu Aizpuru, Wálter Velázquez and Moshe Cohen.

learningPath.paragraph: He also trained in Buenos Aires, where he spent two seasons of six months: he attended the "Circo Criollo" school, taking a mime course with Alberto Ivern, and at the "Teatro del Absurdo Palermo. In 2015 he took the circus didactics and pedagogy course by Patrick Pinchón.

trinxeta.metaDescription: Jordi (Trinxeta) has collaborated as a freelancer with other companies, including Comediants and Clowns Without Borders. Currently he is a member of the Filigranes Company (2004) and the Tub d'Assaig 7'70 Circus Association. He dedicates part of his time to conducting specific workshops as a teacher, his specialty being clown, object manipulation, unicycle and fire juggling.

abstract.paragraph: Currently Jordi is a member of the Filigranes Company (2004) and the Tub d'Assaig 7'70 Circus Association. He dedicates part of his time to conducting specific workshops as a teacher, his specialty being clown, object manipulation, unicycle and fire juggling.

list.title: Jordi Torrens
list.description: He has collaborated as a freelancer with other companies, including Comediants and Clowns Without Borders.

intro.paragraph: Jordi was born in Terrassa (Barcelona) in 1975. From a very young age he has been linked to the popular culture of his city. Until he was 15 he was part of the Esbart Dansaire, Diables de Terrassa, and also of the Minyons de Terrassa casteller group. In 1991 he began to link with street theater collectives, clowns and circus.

learningPath.paragraph: Jordi has always given great importance to his training and that is why he has been under the direction of recognized clown masters both nationally and internationally, such as Manu Aizpuru, Moshe Cohen, Walter Velázquez, Patrick Pinchón (circus didactics and pedagogy course), or Loco Brusca ("El cuerpo creativo").

background.paragraph: Very soon he created two characters: "Trinxat Tremola", a clumsy clown with whom he performs on small stages, circus conventions and cabarets for adults; and "Trinxoff", sharp and white-faced. It is during these years that he also collaborates as a freelancer with other companies, including Comediants (2008). In 2010 he participated with Clowns Without Borders on an expedition to Lebanon.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.metaDescription: Cia Filigranes cookie policy. Information about the use of cookies on our website.

sections.title: Objective
sections.description: Cia Filigranes uses cookies to save language preferences. We recognize the importance of complying with current privacy and data protection regulations, especially Spanish law (LSSI and LOPDGDD) and Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR). This policy describes in detail the use we make of cookies on our website.

sections.title: Acceptance of the cookie policy
sections.description: Continued use of the website after the cookie banner is displayed and positive configuration or action on it implies acceptance of our cookie policy. If the user decides to block or disable cookies, they can do so through browser options, but this decision may limit some functionality.

sections.title: What is a cookie?
sections.description: A cookie is a small text file that is stored in the user's browser when they visit a website, to save temporary information or to maintain specific settings and preferences.

list.title: Technical (essential) cookies:
list.description: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site, such as language preference cookies, session identification and other technical functions.

list.title: Personalization cookies:
list.description: Allow remembering specific preferences such as the selected language or visual configuration.

list.title: Analytics cookies:
list.description: Allow collecting anonymous information about how the user interacts with the site to improve the experience. We do not use Google Analytics or other analytics tools that generate cookies.

list.title: Third-party cookies:
list.description: We use YouTube cookies only if embedded video playback is activated. We also use Google Maps cookies to display the location map of the Filigranes Company headquarters. These are managed by Google/YouTube and Google respectively, and are disabled by default until acceptance.

table.note: Other cookies or analytics tools are not used.

selfHosted.title: Self-hosted fonts
selfHosted.description: We use self-hosted fonts (IBM Plex Sans and Archivo Black) on our server to avoid third-party Google Fonts cookies, thus improving privacy and loading speed.

disable.title: How to disable or block cookies
disable.description: The user can configure their browser to manage and disable cookies. It should be known that disabling may affect the optimal functioning of the site.

browsers.name: Safari iPhone, iPad and iPod touch and Safari for Mac

additional.title: Additional information
additional.description: When accessing certain external services such as Google Maps, which use iframes, cookies from these third parties not directly controlled by us may be set.

banner.description: We only use cookies to store your language preferences and improve your browsing experience.

modal.title: Cookie settings
modal.description: You can activate or deactivate the different categories of cookies according to your preferences.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Include language preference that remembers your selection.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.description: Allow viewing the Google Maps, playing show videos and improve website functionality. Without them, you'll see a message instead of the map and videos.

avis-legal.title: Legal notice
avis-legal.metaDescription: Legal notice of Cia Filigranes. Information about website ownership, terms of use, intellectual property and cookie policy.

sections.title: Information about the Owner
sections.description: In accordance with article 10 of Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce, the user is informed that the ownership of this website corresponds to the Filigranes Company, member of the Sociocultural Circus Association of Terrassa Tub d'Assaig 7'70, with address at Sant Leopold street, no. 63, Local 5, 08221 Terrassa (Barcelona), with NIF G-65190431 and email ciafiligranes{at}gmail.com. Its members are registered in the Registry of the Association of Circus Professionals of Catalonia with membership numbers 0397 and 0237.

sections.title: Access and use conditions
sections.description: Any person who accesses this website assumes the role of user and undertakes to observe and strictly comply with the provisions indicated here, as well as any other applicable legal provision. The website managers reserve the right to modify, without prior notice, any type of information that may appear on the website, with its publication on this same site being considered sufficient.

sections.title: Code of conduct
sections.description: The website managers are adhered to the Standard Code of Conduct of the Association of Circus Professionals of Catalonia.

sections.title: Intellectual and industrial property
sections.description: All exploitation rights are reserved. This website is governed by Spanish laws and is protected by national and international legislation on intellectual and industrial property. Total or partial reproduction, use, exploitation, distribution and commercialization requires in any case prior written authorization from the Filigranes Company. Any unauthorized use will be considered a serious breach of intellectual and industrial property rights. The designs, logos, texts or graphics from third parties that may appear on the web belong to their respective owners, these being responsible for any possible controversy about them. To report possible breaches of rights, you can do so via email: ciafiligranes{at}gmail.com.

sections.title: Contents
sections.description: This website aims to facilitate knowledge of the activities and services of the Filigranes Company. It reserves the right to modify the contents and presentation of the site at any time and without prior notice.

sections.title: Links
sections.description: The available links have as their sole objective to facilitate access to other related sources of information. The website may contain hyperlinks to third-party pages over which the Filigranes Company exercises no control. No guarantee is given nor is any responsibility assumed for the accuracy or updating of the information offered. In case of detecting content that contravenes legislation or public order, the Filigranes Company will proceed to its immediate removal.

sections.title: Exclusion of guarantees and liability
sections.description: The website managers are exempt from any type of liability derived from content introduced by third parties, as well as service interruptions or internal or external technical problems. No responsibility is also assumed for content published by third parties on forums, social networks or other associated external media.

sections.title: Privacy and protection of personal data
sections.description: Personal data that may be provided via email or phone will only be used to manage inquiries or bookings of shows, workshops or animations with the Filigranes Company. This website does not collect personal data through forms, leaving it to the user's discretion to contact or not through the available channels.

sections.title: Applicable law and jurisdiction
sections.description: For the resolution of all controversies or issues related to this website, Spanish legislation is applicable. The parties expressly submit to the Courts and Tribunals of Barcelona (Spain).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This website uses cookies to ensure its correct functioning and improve the browsing experience. Cookies are small files that are stored in the user's browser and allow certain preferences to be remembered. None of the cookies used allow access to personal data or the content of your device.

categories.title: Essential (necessary for site operation):
categories.description: Language preference cookie (first-party): stores the selected language (Catalan, Spanish, English) to maintain it in future visits.

categories.title: Functional
categories.description: YouTube (third-party, Google/YouTube): used only if video playback is activated. Includes cookies for playback preferences. Google Maps (third-party, Google): used to display the location map of the Filigranes Company headquarters. By default, the web configuration keeps YouTube and Google Maps cookies disabled until the user accepts them.

categories.title: Disabled by default / Not used:
categories.description: No data is collected through Google Analytics or similar tools. There are no tracking pixels or advertising cookies. localStorage or sessionStorage is not used for tracking purposes. The fonts (IBM Plex Sans and Archivo Black) are self-hosted on our server to avoid third-party Google Fonts cookies.

categories.title: External service with possible cookie emission:
categories.description: Google Maps (third-party, Google): if the embedded map is accessed, Google may install cookies associated with its service.

categories.title: Cookie management:
categories.description: The user can configure their browser to reject or delete cookies. However, if essential cookies are disabled, the site may not function properly. You can consult your browser's help options for more information on how to manage them.
